definition: Cantonese/short name for Guangdong 廣東|广东[Guang3 dong1]
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: Cantonese cuisine, the hardest to categorize, emphasizes light cooking with seemingly limitless range of ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 最难归类的粤菜强调轻炒浅煮，选料似乎不受限制。

sentences.english: Sweet and sour pork is one of the classic foods in Cantonese cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 咕噜肉是粤菜中的经典菜肴，以甜酸汁和猪肉煮成。

sentences.english: The most famous dish, Dragon and Tiger Fight, is a dish of braised snake and leopard.
sentences.chinese: 粤菜里最有名是“龙虎斗”，也就是炖蛇肉和豹肉。

sentences.english: Our restaurant mainly serves Guangdong cuisine, including Chaozhou, Shantou and Hakka dishes.
sentences.chinese: 本餐厅主理粤菜，包括潮汕菜和客家菜。

sentences.english: An emphasis on preserving the natural flavor of the food is the hallmark of Cantonese cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 保留食物的原汁原味是粤菜的最大特色。

sentences.english: I guess most of them serve Cantonese dishes.
sentences.chinese: 我想大多数供应的是粤菜。

sentences.english: What are the main condiments of Cantonese dishes?
sentences.chinese: 粤菜的主要佐料是什么？

sentences.english: We have Cantonese, Sichuan, and Shanghai food.
sentences.chinese: 我们有粤菜，川菜和上海菜。

sentences.english: In Cantonese cuisine, shrimp filled wonton is most commonly served with thin noodles to make wonton noodles.
sentences.chinese: 在粤菜，虾填补馄饨是最常见的送达细面，使云吞面。

sentences.english: This recipe book show us the common practice of the cantonese cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 这本菜谱书向我们展示了市面上粤菜通行的做法。

sentences.english: Guangdong cuisine one of the Eight Great Cuisines emphasizes seafood and unique mixed flavorings .
sentences.chinese: 粤菜是八大菜系之一，主要是海鲜及其独特的调味料。

sentences.english: Authentic Cantonese cuisine and the best of Suzhou's fare.
sentences.chinese: 为留恋中餐美味的您奉上正宗粤菜和苏式佳肴。

sentences.english: Let me treat you to a Cantonese restrautant.
sentences.chinese: 让我请你到一家粤菜馆吃饭。

sentences.english: Canton cuisine, the hardest to categorize, emphasizes light cooking and seemingly limitless range of ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 最难归类的粤菜强调轻炒浅煮，选料似乎不受限制。

definition: siu mei/spit-roasted meat dish in Cantonese cuisine
Japanese cuisine (abbr. for 日本料理[Ri4 ben3 liao4 li3])
dish (food prepared according to a specific recipe)
